H0.text: who is sir james dyson. Inventor

H1.text: who is sir james dyson. Engineer

H2.text: who is sir james dyson. Entrepreneur

H3.text: who is sir james dyson. Designer

A4.text: Founded in 1991 by James Dyson in Malmesbury, England, the company designs and manufactures household appliances such as vacuum cleaners, air purifiers, hand dryers, bladeless fans, heaters, hair dryers, and lights.

A5.text: He then built a 30-foot model for the ballbarrow factory. While constructing this at home, Dyson realised the function of the cyclone was to extract dust without clogging.
